cbhash.name: CB Hash
cbhash.description: cornedbeefhash - Produces a hash using MD5, SHA-1 or SHA-256 algorithms. Supports hexadecimal and base-64 output format. HMAC implentation also available. (Thanks Lucid for the name)

onhashed0.description: Triggered when a new hash is generated.

set_hexoutput0.list-name: Set inner algorithm hexadecimal output format
set_hexoutput0.display-text: Set inner algorithm hexadecimal output format to [b]{0}[/b].
set_hexoutput0.description: Sets the inner algorithm hexadecimal output format. Might help for server-side compatibility.

format2.name: Format
format2.desc: Choose the output format in the algorithm.

set_bpad1.description: Sets base64 pad character. "=" for strict RFC compliance.

base64_pad_character2.name: Base64 pad character
base64_pad_character2.desc: Base64 pad character. "=" for strict RFC compliance.

md5_hash2.display-text: MD5 - Encode [i]{0}[/i] as a MD5 hash. Output format: [b]{1}[/b].
md5_hash2.description: Encodes the data provided with MD5 algorithm.

format3.name: Format
format3.desc: Choose the final output format of the encoded string.

md5_pass3.display-text: MD5 - Encode {0} as a MD5 password using {1} characters only.
md5_pass3.description: Encode a string using a string of characters.

hmac_hash4.display-text: HMAC-MD5 - Encode a keyed hash of [i]{1}[/i] using [i]{0}[/i] as a key. Output format : [b]{2}[/b].
hmac_hash4.description: Encodes a data string using a string key in order to make a HMAC-MD5 (Hash-based Message Authentication Code) hash.

data1.name: Data
data1.desc: Data to encode with the key

format4.name: Format
format4.desc: Choose the output format of the encoded string.

hmac_pass5.display-text: HMAC-MD5 - Generate a password out of [i]{1}[/i] using [i]{0}[/i] as a key and [i]{2}[/i] as character string to encode.
hmac_pass5.description: Generate an HMAC-MD5 (Hash-based Message Authentication Code) password using provided data, key and character string.

data1.name: Data
data1.desc: Data to encode with the key

string2.name: String
string2.desc: Character string used for the encode

sha1_hash6.display-text: SHA-1 - Encode [i]{0}[/i] as a SHA-1 hash. Output format: [b]{1}[/b].
sha1_hash6.description: Encodes the data provided with SHA-1 algorithm.

format3.name: Format
format3.desc: Choose the final output format of the encoded string.

sha1_pass7.display-text: SHA-1 - Encode {0} as a SHA-1 password using {1} characters only.
sha1_pass7.description: Encode a string using a string of characters.

hmacsha1_hash8.display-text: HMAC-SHA-1 - Encode a keyed hash of [i]{1}[/i] using [i]{0}[/i] as a key. Output format : [b]{2}[/b].
hmacsha1_hash8.description: Encodes a data string using a string key in order to make a HMAC-SHA-1 (Hash-based Message Authentication Code) hash.

data1.name: Data
data1.desc: Data to encode with the key

format4.name: Format
format4.desc: Choose the output format of the encoded string.

hmacsha1_pass9.display-text: HMAC-SHA-1 - Generate a password out of [i]{1}[/i] using [i]{0}[/i] as a key and [i]{2}[/i] as character string to encode.
hmacsha1_pass9.description: Generate an HMAC-SHA-1 (Hash-based Message Authentication Code) password using provided data, key and character string.

data1.name: Data
data1.desc: Data to encode with the key

string2.name: String
string2.desc: Character string used for the encode

sha256_hash10.display-text: SHA-256 - Encode [i]{0}[/i] as a SHA-256 hash. Output format: [b]{1}[/b].
sha256_hash10.description: Encodes the data provided with SHA-256 algorithm.

format3.name: Format
format3.desc: Choose the final output format of the encoded string.

sha256_pass11.display-text: SHA-256 - Encode {0} as a SHA-256 password using {1} characters only.
sha256_pass11.description: Encode a string using a string of characters.

hmacsha256_hash12.display-text: HMAC-SHA-256 - Encode a keyed hash of [i]{1}[/i] using [i]{0}[/i] as a key. Output format : [b]{2}[/b].
hmacsha256_hash12.description: Encodes a data string using a string key in order to make a HMAC-SHA-256 (Hash-based Message Authentication Code) hash.

data1.name: Data

format4.desc: Choose the output format of the encoded string.

hmacsha256_pass13.description: Generate an HMAC-SHA-256 (Hash-based Message Authentication Code) password using provided data, key and character string.

md51.description: MD5(Hexa) - Encodes the data provided with MD5 algorithm.

md5b2.description: MD5(base64) - Encodes the data provided with MD5 algorithm.

md5pass3.description: Generate a password from data using only the characters from charstring.

hmacmd54.description: (Hexa) Encodes a data string using a string key in order to make a HMAC-MD5 (Hash-based Message Authentication Code) hash.

hmacmd5b5.description: (base64) Encodes a data string using a string key in order to make a HMAC-MD5 (Hash-based Message Authentication Code) hash.

hmacmd5pass6.description: Generate an HMAC-MD5 (Hash-based Message Authentication Code) password using provided data, key and character string.

sha1b8.description: SHA-1(base64) - Encodes the data provided with SHA-1 algorithm.

sha1pass9.description: Generate a password from data using only the characters from charstring.

hmacsha110.description: (Hexa) Encodes a data string using a string key in order to make a HMAC-SHA-1 (Hash-based Message Authentication Code) hash.

hmacsha1b11.description: (base64) Encodes a data string using a string key in order to make a HMAC-SHA-1 (Hash-based Message Authentication Code) hash.

sha256b14.description: SHA-256(base64) - Encodes the data provided with SHA-256 algorithm.

hmacsha25616.description: (Hexa) Encodes a data string using a string key in order to make a HMAC-SHA-256 (Hash-based Message Authentication Code) hash.
